full_summary:
### Tender Announcement : Temporary Help Services
#### Reference: CB-152-12120232

**Supply Arrangement: EN578-172870**

We are announcing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement EN578-172870, for which the Department of National Defense (DND) is the contracting entity. 

* The RFP is exclusive to Supply Arrangement holders who qualified under stream 13.9 Special Advisor.
* The following suppliers are invited to submit a proposal:
  - Action Personnel of Ottawa-Hull Ltd 
  - ADGA Group Consultants Inc. 
  - AZUR HUMAN RESOURCES LIMITED 
  - Cofomo Inc. 
  - Eagle Professional Resources Inc. 
  - H2 ANALYTICS INC. 
  - Maplesoft Consulting Inc. 
  - Michael Wager Consulting Inc. 
  - NATTIQ INC. 
  - Ombre Consulting Services Incorporated 
  - Pleiad Canada Inc. 
  - Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP 
  - Systemscope Inc. 
  - T.I.7 Inc. 
  - The Right Door Consulting & Solutions Incorporated 

**Security Requirements:**

* Level of Security Requirement: Secret

**Proposal Submission:**

* Submissions must be made through the documentation attached.

**Details:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-12-06T12:00:00
* Notice URL: None
* Contact Information: 
  - Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
  - Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
  - Phone: (613) 971-7955
* Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26099/s4742762---method-2---rfp-%281.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/26099/s4742762---method-2---rfp-%281.pdf)

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Updated Information

* Amendment Number: 4
* Amendment Date: 2023-12-06
* Expected
